title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama-2, CodeLlama, Mistral, Gemma & other LLMs locally on macOS, Linux, Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat model inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embedding, model management.

title: ollama-cli-crystal
summary: Crystal-lang CLI and library for Ollama with native binary builds.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, list, delete, embeddings.

title: ollama-workflows
summary: GitHub Actions to pull & cache Ollama models and run CI benchmarks on self-hosted GPUs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU node selector & autoscaling.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with app mentions, DM support, and per-channel model settings.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM calls.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama with native async and compile-time model wrappers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama generate/chat/embed APIs.

title: ollama-cpp
summary: Header-only C++17 client library for Ollama with CMake FetchContent support.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client for Ollama using std.http with async I/O and build.zig integration.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for Ollama: chat, generate, embeddings, streaming for mobile & desktop.
